colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @044A *, ,(DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U AI PA'I LUGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR CHEN POR 'JUG CING DBANG BLANG BA'I CHO GA BDE CHEN ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'DUS PA DAR BDE MCHOG GI THUN MONG GI BSHAD RGYUD RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA LAS, DBANG BCU BZHI'I RNAM BZHAG GSUNGS PA'I RJES SU 'BRANGS SHING, LO DRIL GNYIS THUN MONG GIS CHOG PA RNAMS RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO RANG NYID KYIS MDZAD PA'I DROL BU DKYIL CHOG GZHIR BZHAG CING, LO DRIL GYI MI 'DRA BA'I KHYAD PAR DBYE DGOS PA RNAMS, ,D'A RI KA PA DANG, LAM KA RGYAL BZANG BA DANG, @044B DKYIL CHOG RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA DANG, RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I LAM GYI GSUNGS PA DAG LAS, ,GANG 'JUG PA BDE BA DANG, SKABS SU JI LTAR BAB PA BZHIN BKOD DE, ,DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYI MKHYEN BRTZE CIG TU BSDUS PA'I NGO BO, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG DBYER MA MCHIS PA'I RJE BTZUN BLA MA RTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NYID KYI ZHABS KYI PAD MO LA SPYI BOS REG PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS, ,RTZANG NYANG STOD RIG PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYI SA'I CHA, ,DPAL RI BO MDANGS CAN GYI DGON PAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,,SVA STI, ,BDE MCHOG ZUNG 'JUG ,NOR BU'I RGYA MTSO LA, DBANG BSGYUR MKHAS PA'I GLING DU GRANGS  MED BYON, ,DE LAS 'ONGS PA'I LEGS BSHAD GAm GI'I RGYUN, ,GANGS CAN LJONGS 'DIR BAB KYANG NYAMS SU, ,RJE BTZUN LHA YI DBANG PO BLO BZANG MCHOG ,GRAGS PA 'BRUG STONG SGROG PAS SHES BYA'I MKHA', ,MA LUS KHYAB PA'I MKHYEN BRTZE'I CHU 'DZIN LAS, ,LEGS BSHAD BDUD RTZI'I CHAR RGYUN MI BZAD PHAB, ,DGE LEGS BLO GROS YANGS PA'I RDZING MCHOG BKANG, ,DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO'I BRLABS PHRENG GA-YOS PA LAS, ,DRANGS PA'I RNAM NGAG DBANG BZHI'I CHU BO'I RGYUN, ,SKAL BZANG ZHING PA'I LO TOG RGYAS BYED 'DI, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN DU GNAS PHYIR DANG, SANGS RGYAS SKYID KYI SGRIB GNYIS SBYANG BA'I PHYIR, ,'BYOR LDAN GTONG PHOD NAM MKHA' DBANG PHYUG GIS, ,'THUN RKYEN LEGS PAR SBYAR TE RIG 'BYED PA, GZHUNG PA SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL GYI RI MO LA, ,SPAR MKHAN MKHAS PA BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG POS BRKOS, ,DOD MA DGE BSKUL SDOM BRTZON BSOD 'PHEL @045A *, ,GYIS, GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG GI RE DGON DU BSGRUBS, ,'DI YI PHYIR DU SGO GSUM 'BAD PA DANG, ,'BYOR BA CUNG ZAD BTANG PA'I RAB DKAR GYIS, ,'GRO BA KUN KYANG LAM 'DIR ZHUGS NAS, ,'GROL BYED LAM GYIS ZUNG 'JUG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,CHU PHO SPRE'U LO DBYID ZLA RAB CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS, ,DPAL LDAN GE RE KUN DU BZANG PO'I NAGS KHROD, ,MING GZHAN SKYID LUNG LHA SDENGS DGON PAR GRUB
